snippet: It is all too easy to blame experts and con men when things go awry in our financial lives, says Carl Richards, in an excerpt from his new book, "Behavior Gap."
abstract: It is all too easy to blame experts and con men when things go awry in our financial lives, says Carl Richards, in an excerpt from his new book, "Behavior Gap."
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His new book, "The Behavior Gap," was published earlier this month. Here is an excerpt from his book. His sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog.

headline.main: You're Responsible for Your Own Behavior
